allow: Bash(# Test with a point that is clearly on water \(offshore\) curl -s -H ""Accept: application/json"" -H ""User-Agent: FishingBoatingApp"" ""https://api.weather.gov/zones?type=marine&point=26.0,-79.9"" | python3 -m json.tool)

Bash(# Test: get the zone ID from the alerts response and fetch alerts for that zone curl -s -H ""Accept: application/geo+json"" -H ""User-Agent: FishingBoatingApp"" ""https://api.weather.gov/alerts/active?zone=AMZ651"")

Bash(# Test with a land-based point \(downtown Fort Lauderdale\) vs the offshore point # First, land point echo ""=== LAND POINT \(Fort Lauderdale downtown: 26.12, -80.14\) ==="" curl -s -H ""Accept: application/geo+json"" -H ""User-Agent: FishingBoatingApp"" ""https://api.weather.gov/alerts/active?point=26.12,-80.14"")

Bash(# The key question: how do we get marine alerts for a user who is on land near the coast? # Option 1: Use the zones endpoint to find nearby marine zones echo ""=== Option 1: Find marine zones near a land point ==="" echo ""Trying /zones?type=marine&point=26.12,-80.14 \(land point\)"" curl -s -H ""Accept: application/json"" -H ""User-Agent: FishingBoatingApp"" ""https://api.weather.gov/zones?type=marine&point=26.12,-80.14"")

Bash(# Check if we can find marine forecast zones for the CWA office \(MFL = Miami\) curl -s -H ""Accept: application/json"" -H ""User-Agent: FishingBoatingApp"" ""https://api.weather.gov/zones?type=marine&area=FL"")

Bash(# The area parameter for zones likely uses a different code for marine. Let me try different approaches echo ""=== Try listing marine zones by office ==="" curl -s -H ""Accept: application/json"" -H ""User-Agent: FishingBoatingApp"" ""https://api.weather.gov/offices/MFL"")

Bash(# Check the Open-Meteo Marine API docs to definitively confirm no advisory data curl -s ""https://marine-api.open-meteo.com/v1/marine?latitude=26.1&longitude=-80.1&hourly=wave_height,wave_period&forecast_days=1"")
Bash(# Let me also check what the Open-Meteo Marine API offers as hourly parameters curl -s ""https://open-meteo.com/en/docs/marine-weather-api"")
Bash(cd /Users/stevewilson/Documents/Git\\ Repos/freemium_build && npm info resend@4 version:*)
